projects.title: Ml Model Deployment
projects.description: Developed a robust data pipeline for deploying machine learning models with a focus on tailored algorithms for diverse AI applications. Achieved outstanding accuracy rate exceeding 90% in high-impact projects for US clients. Utilized Triton Server, Flask, and AWS deep learning deployment services for streamlined model training and deployment workflows.

projects.title: Deep Learning Optimization
projects.description: Transformed PyTorch model into TensorRT, resulting in a 5x boost in inference time for optimized performance.

projects.title: Synthetic Data Generation
projects.description: Led the development of innovative synthetic data creation and augmentation methods to enhance model accuracy and overall performance.

projects.title: Ml Solution Design
projects.description: Designed machine learning systems and self-running AI software to automate predictive models.

projects.title: End-to-End Project Execution
projects.description: Spearheaded high-impact projects for US clients, overseeing end-to-end project execution, problem formulation, development, and deployment.

projects.title: Statistical Analysis
projects.description: Evaluated existing software systems, performed statistical analysis to resolve data set problems, and developed ML solutions to enhance predictive automation capabilities.
